column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5422cca4fdf99b328c91b21b', 'recall_text': "I was a rookie at the police station, and my chief inspector there was a powerful man. He had a daughter who was always trying to get my attention and to tell the truth, I was not interested. However she sent me a message, and then seemed to run away, so her dad came to me to find out where she was. I said we should go and look for her and if we cannot find her then she should do whatever he feels is necessary. We went to where her scarf was and she wasn't there, but after looking a while we found her at the police station reading a book - she hadn't run away. I was warned afterwards by a police officer that I should redeploy as the chief never forgets, so that's what I did. And that was the end of my rookie year.", 'recall_len': 723, 'max_clause_id': 21, 'mbits_original_narrative': 20.85, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 21.2}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '571a82d06a1c6300094c6a19', 'recall_text': 'When I started as a rookie policeman I was introduced to my boss who happened to be a war veteran. He had the reputation of being really good at catching criminals. I at the time was one of these kind of people who liked going to the gym I liked to keep myself fit. At the time this police chief had a daughter who was sweet on me. I never liked her because she was a chatterbox and never encouraged her to be over friendly with me. One particular the chief asked me for help to look for his daughter who had run away after complaining that she was getting chastised for always talking about me. We got the whole force out looking for her and found a scarf on a bench. Eventually we carried on searching and found her reading a book under a tree. Everyone was very relieved but the deputy warned me that I better ask for a transfer because the "old man never forgets anything" so i put in for a transfer and that was the end of my rookie career.', 'recall_len': 945, 'max_clause_id': 24, 'mbits_original_narrative': 25.81, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 22.37}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5b3f93fc1388aa0001a80aaf', 'recall_text': "When I was a rookie police officer the chief was a veteran. He had caught an important criminal and won an award. Back then I was a fitness enthusiast. He had a daughter who showed an interest in me but I hadn't noticed. She was a charming girl until she opened her mouth. She was a chatterbox. Goodness she could talk. One day she had left a note saying she was going to run away because he was always scolding her. He came to my apartment big intimidating look on his face. I said I would help to look for her but then he could do what he feels is right. I was strategizing. We looked where we thought she would go, by the park and found her scarf. But then we couldn't find a trace. We turned and she was in the police station reading a book. She hadn't run away. Another officer told me you had better transfer because he never forgets anything once he has it in his mind, When I was a rookie police officer the chief was a veteran. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5c71ca9bf6c9fe00013ef0b5', 'recall_text': "It was my rookie year at a Police Station. The captain there was a veteran and had received commendations for bravery and for capturing a criminal. His daughter liked me. I was a fitness fanatic. But I didn't like her. She talked far too much. One day she left me a message saying that she was going to run away. As her father (my boss) was always telling her off about her infatuation with me. Her father came to my apartment that evening. And was very intimidating. But I was able to calm him down. And suggested that we team up and look for her. He agreed with this. And we started searching at a point where her scarf had been discovered. We were unsuccessful. I encouraged him to keep looking. And we headed back to the Police Station. His daughter was in there, sitting in a chair, with a book in her hand. Although that situation was resolved. I was soon warned by her father's Deputy that my boss wouldn't forget this. And would likely blame me for the situation. He (the deputy) suggested that I transfer away from that Station. I took his advice. And did so. And concluded my rookie year at another Station.", 'recall_len': 1117, 'max_clause_id': 25, 'mbits_original_narrative': 21.07, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 23.76}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5c8808098d2bbf0017e4b527', 'recall_text': "I was a rookie cop. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5cbf5803d2051000017d02fa', 'recall_text': 'Back in the day in my time in the police force my manager/chief had a daughter. I was in my rookie era. I was a fitness enthusiast and his daughter was after me. She was a chatterbox, she never stopped talking. One day he turned up at my house and said she had gone missing, I said we best go and look. We found a scarf and carried on looking but it turns out she was at the police station. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5ce059ad3f8060001509faaa', 'recall_text': "The narrator was a rookie police man. His chief of police had caught really bad men. The narrator was a fitness enthusiast. The chiefs daughter took a liking to him. One day his daughter ran away after being scolded. The chief came to the narrators house. The chief was angry. The narrator strategized. The narrator said let's go and look for her together. If we don't find her do what you will. They looked and looked. Eventually they found her at the police station with a pink scarf. She had not run away. The narrator was told that he should leave the department. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5d5c250a0274020016e2333a', 'recall_text': "When I was a rookie at the police station, the chief, who was then a veteran won an award for bravery. In the end she was found sitting in the police station reading, so she had not run away. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5d667a1a3741ea0001c719b9', 'recall_text': "A man describes his rookie year as a policeman. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5d833b0e6642ee0001bfa9cb', 'recall_text': 'working in police force and met a girl who was the chiefs daughter. he didnt like her as she had a big mouth.', 'recall_len': 109, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': 11.86, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 9.14}

column3: {'segment_id': 3, 'segment_text': 'or had been awarded for bravery.', 'recall_id': '5d833b0e6642ee0001bfa9cb', 'recall_text': 'working in police force and met a girl who was the chiefs daughter. he didnt like her as she had a big mouth.', 'recall_len': 109, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': 1.48, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'or received recognition for his courage.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 2.34}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5df252f758a5c71603afc39a', 'recall_text': "The narrator worked in a police station. The Chief didn't like his daughter seeing the narrator and he would scold her for talking to him. She ran away because of this and the Chief came to the narrators house so they could look for her. They went to a park and found her scarf. She was actually in the police station sitting on a chair reading a book when they found her. The Deputy, Frank, advised the narrator to transfer to a different station because even though she wasn't lost the Chief doesn't forget things and would make it difficult for the narrator to stay. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5e0dd8d94cac685279492212', 'recall_text': "The story is in first person, about someone recalling a time they were a 'rookie' police officer in their first year on the force. Their police chief / captain had a good reputation - had recently caught a renowned criminal. The captain had a daughter who was very 'fond' of the Rookie. She was into fitness and she was trying to interact / engage with the rookie. But he wasn't really interested - he thought she was ok until she opened her mouth and started talking as he describes her as a 'chatterbox' One day, the daughter came to the rookie and said she was running away because he (her father?) was always on her case. Later that day the police captain came knocking on the rookie's door asking for help as his daughter was missing. The rookie strategised and played the game - trying to help find the daughter and keep the captain happy. They looked for her and although found her scarf they couldn't track her down. Then, at the police station she was there, with a book in hand. She hadn't run away and was safe. Afterwards, another colleague advised him to leave as the 'captain never forgets anything'. So the Rookie did take the advice and leave, ending their first year as a rookie at that station.", 'recall_len': 1212, 'max_clause_id': 24, 'mbits_original_narrative': 21.16, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 20.57}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5ec848e98af2e014101df8e5', 'recall_text': 'When I was a rookie police officer my chief was a big deal. He had been awarded for catching a big criminal. I was a big fitness enthusiast back in those days. His daughter had her eye on me. I wasn’t interested because as charming as she was she was a chatterbox. She told me she would run away as her father wanted her to date me and I wouldn’t. Her father came to me saying she had run away. I said I would help look for her and if we couldn’t find her he could do whatever he needed too. We looked at the park where her scarf was found. We looked all around but couldn’t find her. When we got back to the station she was there sitting in a car reading a book. The deputy told me I should transfer as once the chief had something in his mind he wouldn’t forget it. I transferred and that was the end of my rookie year.', 'recall_len': 821, 'max_clause_id': 24, 'mbits_original_narrative': 26.78, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 26.05}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5ef4ceca768a610b600ee1fb', 'recall_text': 'Back in the days when I as a rookie on the police force, I had a commander. He was a veteran. He had caught a notorious criminal. He had a daughter. I thought she was into me because I was into fitness. I never observed it. I wasn\'t much fond of her because she was a chatterbox. She wanted to run away because her dad always scolded her. Then she did. The commander came to my house with a cold look in his eyes. He wanted to know what happened to his daughter. "Lets go look for her", I said. I was strategizing. So, we went to the park where her scarf was found. Then, it led back to a police station, where she was sitting with a book. She had never run away, and that solved the problem for that day. That evening, a supervisor on the force, Frank Mitchell, said to me, "You need to transfer, once that old man gets something in his head it never leaves". So I did it. I transferred. And that was the end of the story from my days as a rookie on the force.', 'recall_len': 961, 'max_clause_id': 21, 'mbits_original_narrative': 32.53, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 28.33}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5f0a1d89eb65250d7d9eedb4', 'recall_text': "The chief of police is well respected in the community and has a stunning daughter. She is lovely and pretty. But when she opens her mouth she becomes unattractive, she talks too much. Goodness, she is a chatter box. One day she decided to run away, because of her chief police father scolding her all the time. He came to me after she left and demanded I search for her. I said I'll do what I can and then if we can't find her you can do whatever you feel is right. We looked in a park where we last found her scarf and then nothing. We returned to a police station, and there she was, holding a book in her hand. The officer there told me I better transfer because that old man never forgets a thing. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5f2b3b2b4cc04057806945da', 'recall_text': "There was a rookie at a police station, and he had a chief you enjoyed going to the gym. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5f58ad6414fd6902d237d3f3', 'recall_text': 'Guy worked as a rookie in the police force. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5f67ae1b22c41c0e44275dc2', 'recall_text': 'Back in my rookie year on the police force, my Chief had a daughter who was quite fond of me. I was young and a fitness enthusiast. She liked me. But I didn\'t like her. And I though she was cute. But when she opened her mouth it was ruined. She was a chatterbox. I told her I was not interested. One day my Chief Mitchell came to me and said his daughter had run away. I told him "we will go look for her and then we will decide what to do." I was bargaining. We went to the park where they had found her scarf. We looked all around but could not find her. Then we went to the police station and there she was reading a book. She hadn\'t run away at all. column17: {'segment_id': 17, 'segment_text': "and if we can't locate her well you can – do whatever you think is right.”", 'recall_id': '5f702dfd68dfbf000da79ada', 'recall_text': 'Back in the day when he was in the police force, during his rookie year, he tried to explain an incident about locating a charming and missing lady through a scarf that was probably by the river.', 'recall_len': 195, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 4.81, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and if she remains unfound, then you can – take whatever action you deem appropriate.”', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 3.83}

column28: {'segment_id': 28, 'segment_text': 'But that evening the deputy, Frank Mitchell, said “You better transfer and leave because that old man never forgets anything once he gets it into his mind.”', 'recall_id': '5f702dfd68dfbf000da79ada', 'recall_text': 'Back in the day when he was in the police force, during his rookie year, he tried to explain an incident about locating a charming and missing lady through a scarf that was probably by the river.', 'recall_len': 195, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -2.07, 'segment_text_rephrased': "However, that night, the assistant, Frank Mitchell, warned, “You should transfer and go because the old man never lets go of anything once it's in his head.”", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -3.76}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5f9e93bb62e24043c32378d7', 'recall_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran. He had caught a notorious criminal or had been awarded for bravery. But he had a young daughter. And in those days I was a fitness enthusiast and it seemed she was trying to impress me, I had never observed it. Truth is I wasn\'t very fond of them because they were. She was a charming girl until she started to speak. She was a chatterbox. And could she talk. Then she left a message one day saying that she was going to run away, because she was unhappy about me. He arrived at my apartment. A big intimidating look on his face. I managed to calm him down and suggested that "we\'ll search for her and if we can\'t locate her well you can do whatever you think is needed" I was strategizing. So he accepted my offer. And we went to where they found her scarf near a park and we traced it down a little more and we couldn\'t locate her. And returned it was a police station, she was sitting on a chair with a book in her hands. She hadn\'t run away, nevertheless that resolved the issue that day. That evening the deputy Mitchell said " you better transfer and leave because that old man never forgets anything once gets it in his mind" And so I did, I transferred and left. That was the end of my rookie year.', 'recall_len': 1289, 'max_clause_id': 29, 'mbits_original_narrative': 49.02, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 39.04}

And in those days I was a fitness enthusiast and it seemed she was trying to impress me, I had never observed it. Truth is I wasn\'t very fond of them because they were. She was a charming girl until she started to speak. She was a chatterbox. And could she talk. Then she left a message one day saying that she was going to run away, because she was unhappy about me. He arrived at my apartment. A big intimidating look on his face. I managed to calm him down and suggested that "we\'ll search for her and if we can\'t locate her well you can do whatever you think is needed" I was strategizing. So he accepted my offer. And we went to where they found her scarf near a park and we traced it down a little more and we couldn\'t locate her. And returned it was a police station, she was sitting on a chair with a book in her hands. She hadn\'t run away, nevertheless that resolved the issue that day. That evening the deputy Mitchell said " you better transfer and leave because that old man never forgets anything once gets it in his mind" And so I did, I transferred and left. That was the end of my rookie year.', 'recall_len': 1289, 'max_clause_id': 29, 'mbits_original_narrative': 13.92, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'That marked the conclusion of my first year as a novice.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 16.97}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5ff20cdfa4feb069a2164a6d', 'recall_text': 'there was a rookie and his boss got a medal for bravery. he had a daughter, who was a fitness trainer but was also a chatterbox. she went missing and then they went to the park to find her but they found her scarf on a park bench. back at the station she was sitting in a chair reading a book. the rookie transferred and this ended his rookie year.', 'recall_len': 348, 'max_clause_id': 12, 'mbits_original_narrative': 14.78, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 10.77}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '5fff11332f30d263176fa57f', 'recall_text': "In my rookie year the chief was a veteran. The chief came to my house angry, i managed to talk him down and said look lets go to where she was last seen. We went to the park and found her scarf. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '601882967b43c4142c33867c', 'recall_text': "The narrator was a rookie police officer. The chief of police at his station was an angry man with a daughter. The daughter was enamoured by the rookie police officer. Although he thought her to be a chatter box. She told him that if he didn't reciprocate then she would run away. Which she did. The police chief blamed the rookie. Although they teamed up to find the girl. They found her at the police station with a book in her hand. On his next shift the rookie was advised to transfer station. Because the chief was an angry man that never forgets. And he blamed the rookie for his daughter's behaviour. So the rookie did just that. And that was the end of his rookie career.", 'recall_len': 679, 'max_clause_id': 14, 'mbits_original_narrative': 19.88, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 15.09}

column12: {'segment_id': 12, 'segment_text': 'Then she left a message one day saying she was going to run away because he was always scolding her about me.', 'recall_id': '6054ce9cd4e5c96ab84e9113', 'recall_text': 'ONE DAY i WAS IN A POLICE FORCE AND A ROOKIE AND SAW A DAUGHTER WHO WAS A CHATTERBOX', 'recall_len': 84, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': -1.63, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Then one day she left a note saying she planned to elope because he constantly chastised her over me.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.74}
column13: {'segment_id': 13, 'segment_text': 'He arrived at my apartment.', 'recall_id': '6054ce9cd4e5c96ab84e9113', 'recall_text': 'ONE DAY i WAS IN A POLICE FORCE AND A ROOKIE AND SAW A DAUGHTER WHO WAS A CHATTERBOX', 'recall_len': 84, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': -1.23, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'He showed up at my place.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -1.49}

column15: {'segment_id': 15, 'segment_text': 'I managed to calm him down.', 'recall_id': '6054ce9cd4e5c96ab84e9113', 'recall_text': 'ONE DAY i WAS IN A POLICE FORCE AND A ROOKIE AND SAW A DAUGHTER WHO WAS A CHATTERBOX', 'recall_len': 84, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.12, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'I succeeded in pacifying him.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.22}
column16: {'segment_id': 16, 'segment_text': "and proposed “Well we'll search for her", 'recall_id': '6054ce9cd4e5c96ab84e9113', 'recall_text': 'ONE DAY i WAS IN A POLICE FORCE AND A ROOKIE AND SAW A DAUGHTER WHO WAS A CHATTERBOX', 'recall_len': 84, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': 4.06, 'segment_text_rephrased': "and suggested, “Let's look for her together", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.26}
column17: {'segment_id': 17, 'segment_text': "and if we can't locate her well you can – do whatever you think is right.”", 'recall_id': '6054ce9cd4e5c96ab84e9113', 'recall_text': 'ONE DAY i WAS IN A POLICE FORCE AND A ROOKIE AND SAW A DAUGHTER WHO WAS A CHATTERBOX', 'recall_len': 84, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': 3.4, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and if she remains unfound, then you can – take whatever action you deem appropriate.”', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 1.75}
column18: {'segment_id': 18, 'segment_text': 'I was strategizing.', 'recall_id': '6054ce9cd4e5c96ab84e9113', 'recall_text': 'ONE DAY i WAS IN A POLICE FORCE AND A ROOKIE AND SAW A DAUGHTER WHO WAS A CHATTERBOX', 'recall_len': 84, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.17, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'I was making plans.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.77}
column19: {'segment_id': 19, 'segment_text': 'So he accepted my offer.', 'recall_id': '6054ce9cd4e5c96ab84e9113', 'recall_text': 'ONE DAY i WAS IN A POLICE FORCE AND A ROOKIE AND SAW A DAUGHTER WHO WAS A CHATTERBOX', 'recall_len': 84, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.7, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Thus, he agreed to my proposition.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.5}
column20: {'segment_id': 20, 'segment_text': 'And we went to where they found her scarf – near a park.', 'recall_id': '6054ce9cd4e5c96ab84e9113', 'recall_text': 'ONE DAY i WAS IN A POLICE FORCE AND A ROOKIE AND SAW A DAUGHTER WHO WAS A CHATTERBOX', 'recall_len': 84, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.24, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'And off we went to the location where her scarf was discovered – by a park.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -2.0}
column21: {'segment_id': 21, 'segment_text': 'and we traced down a little more', 'recall_id': '6054ce9cd4e5c96ab84e9113', 'recall_text': 'ONE DAY i WAS IN A POLICE FORCE AND A ROOKIE AND SAW A DAUGHTER WHO WAS A CHATTERBOX', 'recall_len': 84, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': 2.64, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and we followed the trail a bit further', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 2.75}

column25: {'segment_id': 25, 'segment_text': 'she was sitting on a chair with a book in her hands.', 'recall_id': '6054ce9cd4e5c96ab84e9113', 'recall_text': 'ONE DAY i WAS IN A POLICE FORCE AND A ROOKIE AND SAW A DAUGHTER WHO WAS A CHATTERBOX', 'recall_len': 84, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.56, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'where she was perched on a seat, engrossed in a book.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.63}

column27: {'segment_id': 27, 'segment_text': 'But – nevertheless – that resolved the issue for that day.', 'recall_id': '6054ce9cd4e5c96ab84e9113', 'recall_text': 'ONE DAY i WAS IN A POLICE FORCE AND A ROOKIE AND SAW A DAUGHTER WHO WAS A CHATTERBOX', 'recall_len': 84, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': -1.26, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'But – still – it settled the matter for the time being.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.52}
column28: {'segment_id': 28, 'segment_text': 'But that evening the deputy, Frank Mitchell, said “You better transfer and leave because that old man never forgets anything once he gets it into his mind.”', 'recall_id': '6054ce9cd4e5c96ab84e9113', 'recall_text': 'ONE DAY i WAS IN A POLICE FORCE AND A ROOKIE AND SAW A DAUGHTER WHO WAS A CHATTERBOX', 'recall_len': 84, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': -2.69, 'segment_text_rephrased': "However, that night, the assistant, Frank Mitchell, warned, “You should transfer and go because the old man never lets go of anything once it's in his head.”", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -3.17}

column32: {'segment_id': 32, 'segment_text': 'That was the end of my rookie year.', 'recall_id': '6054ce9cd4e5c96ab84e9113', 'recall_text': 'ONE DAY i WAS IN A POLICE FORCE AND A ROOKIE AND SAW A DAUGHTER WHO WAS A CHATTERBOX', 'recall_len': 84, 'max_clause_id': 5, 'mbits_original_narrative': -1.12, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'That marked the conclusion of my first year as a novice.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.66}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '607f2e7133afa07084f6be01', 'recall_text': "In my rookie year, there was a chief. He was stern. I was a fitness enthusiast and he had a daughter. She was interested in me and I wasn't. She was a nice girl, but when she opened her mouth... She ran away one day because she said her father was always scolding her because of me. He came to mine and asked me about it. I told him I'd help him look for her and if we couldn't find her, he could do whatever he wanted. I was strategizing. We found her scarf by a park, but we couldn't find her. we returned to the police station and she was sitting there with a book in her hand. A colleague of mine told me to transfer because when the old man gets something in his head, that's all he thinks about. So I transferred.", 'recall_len': 719, 'max_clause_id': 25, 'mbits_original_narrative': 21.45, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 24.58}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '608030a41cd2a2d7cabbba49', 'recall_text': 'In my first year, I was a rookie. The detective was a veteran. He had caught a notorious criminal- or he was awarded for bravery. He had a daughter. She was a fitness instructor. She seemed to have liked me - I never observed it. I did not like for because she was - She was charming until she opened her mouth. She was a chatterbox. one day she left me a note saying she was running away because he was always scolding at her about me. He came furious to my apartment - with an intimidating look. I managed to calm him down. I said "Well we\'ll go look for her and if we can\'t find her - You can do whatever you think is right". I was strategizing. We followed a trail of her scarf they found - near a park. She was not there - We searched a bit further but didn\'t find her. It was at the police station - She was sitting on a chair with a book in her hand. She didnt ran away. the Deputy officer, Fischer said " You should resign and leave, that man never forgets anything once he has it in his mind". So i resigned. and left. and that was the end of my year as a rookie.', 'recall_len': 1072, 'max_clause_id': 30, 'mbits_original_narrative': 22.79, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 23.26}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '609252692568228b9e5399b0', 'recall_text': 'I was a rookie in the police. My boss was a veteran with awards or something like that. He had a charming daughter who like me. I did not like her that much. She was beautiful until she opened her mouth, That girl could talk and talk. She was always fighting with her father, my boss over me. One day she packed up and ran away. My boss came to my apartment with a threatening look And I promised to help him look for his daughter And if we could not find her, he was free to do what he liked. We went to look to look for her at the park where her scarf had been found And we did not find her. We later found her sitting in a corner at the police station, She had not been lost after all. My friend Frank Mitchell told me to ask to be transferred Or else I would get in trouble with my boss. I asked to be transferred And that was it.', 'recall_len': 834, 'max_clause_id': 19, 'mbits_original_narrative': 24.79, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 23.42}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '60a65fa78c5f119da5e887e6', 'recall_text': "Back then when I was a rookie, we had a veteran in our department who had caught a notorious criminal. I was a fitness enthusiast and this veteran had a daughter who took a liking to me. She was charming but the moment she opened her mouth she was a chatterbox boy she could talk. I could not handle her talking. One day the veteran came to look for me and said she was missing because he had scolded her about me. I suggest we go look for her and if we didn't find her he could do whatever he saw fit. I was strategizing. We went to the park where her scarf was found but she was not there. We found her at the police station where she was reading a book. I went home and deputy Frank Miller came to see me and said I better move because the old man never forgets. So I moved. Those were my rookie days.", 'recall_len': 804, 'max_clause_id': 21, 'mbits_original_narrative': 22.6, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 19.6}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '60ed995abcc068230f3c604d', 'recall_text': "He was a rookie in the police force. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '60ff2de87f8a6665bcff2144', 'recall_text': "Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran. He had caught a notorious criminal – or had been awarded for bravery. But he had – a young daughter. And in those days I was a fitness enthusiast. And it seemed she was trying to impress me. I never observed it. Truth is I wasn't very fond of her because she was – She was a charming girl until she opened her mouth. She was a chatterbox. Goodness, she could talk. Then she left a message one day saying she was going to run away because he was always scolding her about me. He arrived at my apartment. Big intimidating look on his face. I managed to calm him down. and proposed “Well we'll search for her and if we can't locate her well you can – do whatever you think is right.” I was strategizing. So he accepted my offer. And we went to where they found her scarf – near a park. and we traced down a little more and we couldn't locate her. And returned – it was a police station – she was sitting on a chair with a book in her hands. She hadn't run away. But – nevertheless – that resolved the issue for that day. But that evening the deputy, Frank Mitchell, said “You better transfer and leave because that old man never forgets anything once he gets it into his mind.” And I did. I transferred. and left. That was the end of my rookie year.", 'recall_len': 1329, 'max_clause_id': 30, 'mbits_original_narrative': 50.08, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 38.37}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '610d1cf3c7b4411f1643e501', 'recall_text': "This is a story about a rookie police officer who had just gotten onto the force. The Chief was an veteran at his job and had just caught a notorious criminal or had been awarded for bravery. But the chief had a young daughter and the rookie police officer was a fitness enthusiast. It seemed like the chief's daughter was trying to impress the rookie. He never observed it. The truth was that he was never fond of her because she was a charming girl until she opened her mouth. She had no manners. One day, the daughter ran away from home. And so the Chief, with an angry look on his face and her scarf went to the rookie police officer to ask for help to find her. Although the rookie said if they couldn't find her, he could go and do whatever he thinks is right. (The chief that is) They could not find her. On the way back, they found her at the Police station, reading a book. That was the day. However that evening, the deputy Frank Mitchell told the rookie that he better transfer as the Chief doesn't forget anything. And so he did.", 'recall_len': 1041, 'max_clause_id': 24, 'mbits_original_narrative': 28.82, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 24.75}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '6160588519c2aaf962da7f48', 'recall_text': "Back in the day, in my rookie year, I was in the police force. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 14.96, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 14.98}
column2: {'segment_id': 2, 'segment_text': 'He had caught a notorious criminal –', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -3.85, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'He had apprehended a well-known felon –', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -3.87}
column3: {'segment_id': 3, 'segment_text': 'or had been awarded for bravery.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 1.43, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'or received recognition for his courage.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 1.88}
column4: {'segment_id': 4, 'segment_text': 'But he had – a young daughter.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 7.2, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Yet he had – a young daughter.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 8.35}
column5: {'segment_id': 5, 'segment_text': 'And in those days I was a fitness enthusiast.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -1.74, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'At that time, I was very passionate about staying fit.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.95}
column6: {'segment_id': 6, 'segment_text': 'And it seemed she was trying to impress me.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 3.2, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'And it appeared she wanted to make an impression on me.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.76}
column7: {'segment_id': 7, 'segment_text': 'I never observed it.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.75, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'I never noticed it.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.16}
column8: {'segment_id': 8, 'segment_text': "Truth is I wasn't very fond of her because she was –", 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 7.26, 'segment_text_rephrased': "Honestly, I didn't have much affection for her because she was –", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 6.77}
column9: {'segment_id': 9, 'segment_text': 'She was a charming girl until she opened her mouth.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 2.89, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'She was delightful until she began to speak.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 3.6}
column10: {'segment_id': 10, 'segment_text': 'She was a chatterbox.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -3.33, 'segment_text_rephrased': "She wouldn't stop talking.", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -1.15}
column11: {'segment_id': 11, 'segment_text': 'Goodness, she could talk.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.83, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Indeed, she was quite the conversationalist.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.07}
column12: {'segment_id': 12, 'segment_text': 'Then she left a message one day saying she was going to run away because he was always scolding her about me.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 1.12, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Then one day she left a note saying she planned to elope because he constantly chastised her over me.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 1.15}
column13: {'segment_id': 13, 'segment_text': 'He arrived at my apartment.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.66, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'He showed up at my place.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.74}
column14: {'segment_id': 14, 'segment_text': 'Big intimidating look on his face.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.39, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'He had a formidable expression.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.15}
column15: {'segment_id': 15, 'segment_text': 'I managed to calm him down.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.2, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'I succeeded in pacifying him.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.0}
column16: {'segment_id': 16, 'segment_text': "and proposed “Well we'll search for her", 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -2.8, 'segment_text_rephrased': "and suggested, “Let's look for her together", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -2.6}
column17: {'segment_id': 17, 'segment_text': "and if we can't locate her well you can – do whatever you think is right.”", 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 3.49, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and if she remains unfound, then you can – take whatever action you deem appropriate.”', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 1.56}
column18: {'segment_id': 18, 'segment_text': 'I was strategizing.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.24, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'I was making plans.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.66}
column19: {'segment_id': 19, 'segment_text': 'So he accepted my offer.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 1.04, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'Thus, he agreed to my proposition.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.53}
column20: {'segment_id': 20, 'segment_text': 'And we went to where they found her scarf – near a park.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -0.98, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'And off we went to the location where her scarf was discovered – by a park.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -2.9}
column21: {'segment_id': 21, 'segment_text': 'and we traced down a little more', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 1.8, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and we followed the trail a bit further', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 2.2}
column22: {'segment_id': 22, 'segment_text': "and we couldn't locate her.", 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 1.01, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'and we failed to find her.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 1.2}

column24: {'segment_id': 24, 'segment_text': '– it was a police station –', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.14, 'segment_text_rephrased': '– to the precinct –', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -1.44}
column25: {'segment_id': 25, 'segment_text': 'she was sitting on a chair with a book in her hands.', 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': -1.33, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'where she was perched on a seat, engrossed in a book.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': -0.94}
column26: {'segment_id': 26, 'segment_text': "She hadn't run away.", 'recall_id': '627966f3451caac7a46ca880', 'recall_text': "Very hard to follow but something about a police chief with a rude daughter and the trainee policeman had to move away because he didn't like him.", 'recall_len': 146, 'max_clause_id': 6, 'mbits_original_narrative': 0.58, 'segment_text_rephrased': "She hadn't actually fled.", 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 0.46}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '637a107251feecf07028be82', 'recall_text': "I joined the police as a rookie. My chief was a veteran and had won awards. I was a fitness enthusiast at the time and his daughter was interested in me. I did not like her as she was a chatterbox. One day she went missing and the chief came to my apartment to confront me. I decided to strategise and said we could go and look for her and if we couldn't find her he could do what he wanted. This seemed to placate him. We went to where her scarf was found but she was not there. We looked further down but no sign of her. Back in the police station she was sat there reading a book. One of my colleagues, Frank Mitchell said to me I should look to go elsewhere as the chief never forgot anything. I did leave. column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '63b5888bd907777799271d04', 'recall_text': 'I was a rookie to a veteran copy. There was a young person (related to the veteran) who was nice enough but annoying when they opened their mouth. They talked too much. I avoided them. They were offended by this and went missing. The Vet was annoyed and came to my apartment. I got a strategy to search for the missing person. We followed it. They turned up in the police station. They had not run away just chose not to be where they should be. I was advised that the Vet would never forget by a colleague, Frank. I left. That was the end of my rookie year!', 'recall_len': 558, 'max_clause_id': 13, 'mbits_original_narrative': 17.87, 'segment_text_rephrased': 'During my early years on the police squad, the Chief was an experienced officer.', 'mbits_rephrased_narrative': 19.78}

column1: {'segment_id': 1, 'segment_text': 'Back in the days when I was a rookie in the police force, the Chief was a veteran.', 'recall_id': '6483247637d20bcecd41963b', 'recall_text': "Back in the day when I was a rookie, I was a veteran, I was into fitness.
